name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Proprietary Blend Formula : Crafted with real pine tar & rosin for the tackiest, longest-lasting grip in baseball
All-Condition Performance : Delivers optimal grip in any weather & stays sticky even with dirt contact
No Activation Needed : Ready to use—no sprays, rubs, or towels required
Long-Lasting Application : One coat lasts an entire tournament, making reapplication unnecessary
Mess-Free Applicator : Features a plastic push-up tube with a screw-on cap to keep pine tar fresh & hands clean
Glove or Bare-Hand Use : Works effectively whether you're swinging with batting gloves or bare hands
Bat Handle Application : Apply between the handle & barrel for ideal grip and control
